messages.text:
I'm sorry, I'm an idiot.  I missed the sort.Strings calls when I read
your diff for the last CL.
You can revert this: sorted beats time ordered (and time ordered beats
random, but moot).

Russ

On Tue, May 1, 2012 at 12:02 PM,  <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Also, the mail says R=rsc but it would be nice if you actually set the
> reviewer list.  The plugin has code to do this (hg change updates it if
> you edit it).

Yeah, it's not so easy to do from a web app. I'd have to do an
authorisation flow so the web app can mutate the issue on behalf of
the user, and that's non-trivial, so that's a future-TODO for now,
pending, for example, Rietveld supporting OAuth2.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Also, the mail says R=rsc but it would be nice if you actually set the reviewer list.  The plugin has code to do this (hg change updates it if you edit it).

http://codereview.appspot.com/6127067/diff/5001/misc/dashboard/codereview/dashboard/cl.go
File misc/dashboard/codereview/dashboard/cl.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6127067/diff/5001/misc/dashboard/codereview/dashboard/cl.go#newcode329
misc/dashboard/codereview/dashboard/cl.go:329: for _, r := range msg.Recipients {
Same should be done here?

http://codereview.appspot.com/6127067/diff/5001/misc/dashboard/codereview/dashboard/cl.go
File misc/dashboard/codereview/dashboard/cl.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6127067/diff/5001/misc/dashboard/codereview/dashboard/cl.go#newcode329
misc/dashboard/codereview/dashboard/cl.go:329: for _, r := range msg.Recipients {
On 2012/05/01 02:02:01, rsc wrote:
> Same should be done here?

It doesn't matter as much, but sure. Done.

subject: code review 6127067: misc/dashboard/codereview: preserve order of LGTMs.
